title: Why is there so much spam today
body: Topic^ seriously why so much also ICanHelpYou(number here) is a lvl bot right cause I had one add me but I'm lvl 30 so as soon as it did it unfriend b4 I could take a screenshot

replies.body:
You don't know ESP Azamalaza?

Well near the end of the original forum's life time, there was this dude who wrote more than 100 posts under 6 hours.

He's back I guess.

He did learn how to not spam so much tho and today's spam is but miniature scale of his true power. Still spammy tho.

What you're seeing right now is a Super Spammer 1. He hasn't even begun his true transformation into a legendary Super Spammer 2 yet, where his spamming powers will defy gravity and Riot's banhammer altogether.
S-senpai! baka has returned. arigato hai desu

It's back? NO PLEASE NO! D:

We already had Petanko come back!
If there is content on the boards you don't want to see make sure to down vote it!

Its okay. Whenever he appears, just talk to him starting with "hi" and mimic him. It will make him feel unrequired.
Hopefully.
